description.en: OPES Community Nodes launched a Defi protocol on the Etheruem blockchain. Using this unique Defi model, nodes will yield their mined PE to the Etheruem blockchain's liquidity miners. PE (wPE) a Governance and Resource Token on the OPES blockchain protocol.
description.de: OPES Community Nodes launched a Defi protocol on the Etheruem blockchain. Using this unique Defi model, nodes will yield their mined PE to the Etheruem blockchain's liquidity miners. PE (wPE) a Governance and Resource Token on the OPES blockchain protocol.
